actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Carmello Solarino, his wife, Natala Grasso Solarino, his sister, Giorgetta Solarino Aleppo, his brother-in-law, Giuseppe Aleppo, his nephews, Orazio Aleppo and Edoardo Aleppo, and his niece, Maria Teresa Aleppo.
